short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert any url to purified markdown file

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Seamless Conversion: Purecast converts any URL into a clean, purified markdown file with just a click. Whether you're dealing with articles, blog posts, or web documents, this tool ensures that your markdown files are free from unwanted formatting and distractions.

2. Enhanced Readability: The plugin strips away excessive HTML and JavaScript, focusing on the essential content. This results in a more readable and printer-friendly format that's perfect for in-depth analysis or academic research.

3. Customizable Output: Purecast gives you control over the conversion process. You can choose to include images, links, and other elements to tailor the output to your needs.

4. Time-Saving: Say goodbye to manual copying and pasting. Purecast automates the conversion process, saving you precious time that you can invest in more productive tasks.

5. Cross-Platform Compatibility: Purecast is designed to work across various platforms, ensuring that no matter your preferred device or operating system, you can always have access to your markdown files.
